mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memp_user( id, openid, account, password, salt, headimg, nickname, mobile, sex, create_date, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{openid}, #{account}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{headimg}, #{nickname}, #{mobile}, #{sex}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
